features.featureTitle: Update Navbar.tsx so that when a user is authenticated, the navbar displays navigation links for 'Home', 'Dashboard', and — visible only to users with isAdmin = true — 'Admin'. The 'Admin' link must be hidden from non-admin authenticated users and from unauthenticated visitors. All links must follow the existing Navy Blue (#0A1F44) and White theme: white text on the navy background, with a hover/active highlight consistent with the current navbar style.
